alert.note: Alert for Dorchester; Inland Worcester; Maryland Beaches; Somerset; Wicomico (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued November 02 at 11:31AM EDT until November 03 at 9:00AM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 9 AM EDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as the upper 20s to lower 30s expected. Locally, areas at the immediate shore and coastlines, as well as highly urbanized locations across the Peninsula will likely remain slightly above freezing. * WHERE...Portions of southeast Maryland and eastern and southeast Virginia. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 9 AM EDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Dorchester; Inland Worcester; Maryland Beaches; Somerset; Wicomico
